name: Boost City
description:
Race for the high score in Boost City! Master your car to drive through checkpoints scattered around the city while time is constantly running out! Earn points by clearing checkpoints fast and learn the layout of the city to improve your routes!

A game for #FragmentJam 2019.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Accelerate/Brake/Steer
  • Space: Flip (when stuck)
  • Left Shift: Boost
